plain: The user's favourite genre is likely to be romantic comedy, as evidenced by the presence of many movies from that genre in their list. The user's favourite kind of plot is likely to be character-driven, as many of the movies on the list focus on the development of the protagonist rather than on action or mystery. The user's favourite kind of musical score is likely to be orchestral, as many of the movies on the list feature this type of score. The user's favourite mood for the musical score is likely to be uplifting, as many of the movies on the list have happy endings. The user's favourite setting is likely to be a fictional or historical one, as many of the movies on the list are set in such locations. The user's favourite visual style is likely to be realistic, as many of the movies on the list are filmed in a documentary-like manner. The user's favourite writing style is likely to be witty and humorous, as many of the movies on the list feature this type of dialogue. The user's favourite runtime is likely to be between 90 and 120 minutes, as many of the movies on the list fall within this range. The user's favourite themes are likely to be love, friendship, and self-discovery.
